page.title: 15THE SCHOOL POSTMAN
page.content: Mr Lock the school postman has been a postman for 22 years.He told us it was a pleasant job being out in the fresh air.{He gets up very early and cycles {the three miles to the sorting office {in Totton.}He aims to arrive in time to start work at 6.a.m.Before he starts his round he has to sort the letters,a job that can take anything from 1to2\ hours.When this has been completed he sets off on his post office bicycle to deliver the letters. {He has approximately 430 homes to {visit on his round and will probably {deliver many thousand letters in a {week averaging a thousand a day.}He usually finishes work at 12 noon and works every day other than Sunday.
